==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Secret Summer Paradise Dance of Flashing Thought 1.png
|text1  = Before the challenge begins, you can adjust your party to fit the various special features of the stage. During the challenge, defeat opponents to accumulate Honed Will. Once you have accumulated enough of it, you will obtain Honed Focus.
|image2 = Tutorial Secret Summer Paradise Dance of Flashing Thought 2.png
|text2  = While Honed Focus lasts, it will grant great buffs to characters' combat ability. Use Honed Will to more effectively defeat your foes and complete the challenge more quickly.
}}

==Challenges==
===Will Honed, Feet Light===
{{Description|When the prelude to a clash of arms begins, the ones who shall take the stage focus their intent on their weapons, welcoming the banquet of battle with absolute poise and calm.}}
Unlocks 2023-07-07 04{{Colon}}00

;Opponents
{{Enemy List|Hydro Hilichurl Rogue*0;Hilichurl Shooter*0;Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl*0;Rock Shield Hilichurl Guard*0;Electro Whopperflower*0;Hilichurl*0;Hilichurl Berserker*0;Anemo Hilichurl Rogue*0;Hilichurl Fighter*0;Hydro Samachurl*0;Electro Hilichurl Shooter*0;Blazing Axe Mitachurl*0;Electro Samachurl*0}}

;Stage Information
* Defeat opponents to accumulate Honed Will and obtain the Honed Focus effect: characters' Movement SPD will be increased by {{Color|BP|40%}}, their interruption resistance will increase, and they will deal True DMG to opponents they touch for {{Color|BP|12}}s. This True DMG can be dealt to opponents once every {{Color|BP|0.5}}s.
* All party members' {{Color|BP|Charged Attack}} DMG increased by {{Color|BP|30}}%.
